About Me

Hi, I'm Shilesh Mavchi, a passionate Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience in software development. I specialize in frontend technologies like React.js and JavaScript, and have hands-on experience in backend frameworks like Django and Spring. I enjoy building creative, responsive, and user-friendly applications.

I have worked on various projects including job portals , editors , and online shopping platforms, where I used my skills in both frontend and backend development. I am constantly learning and improving my skills to stay updated with the latest trends in the tech world.

-- Let's collaborate and create something amazing together! . . .
